name: Heli Rescue (DavidH18)
description:
Heli Rescue

Play as a helicopter rescuing and delivering wounded soldiers to your base, so they can recoup and continue the fight. Be quick though as without those people the enemy will overwhelm your base, but beware trees and tanks are deadly.

How many stages will you survive!!!

Controls

Movement: WASD/Arrow Keys

Next Stage/Reset: R

Based on M*A*S*H for the Atari 2600
